fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £250 There is a 20 per cent discount on weeks in November and December with Cornish Traditional Cottages (01208 821666; www.corncott.com), which offers stays in cottages such as the Mowhay, a converted barn near Bodmin that sleeps four for £219pp. Under £750 Languish on the beautiful beaches of Langkawi, a chilled-out island in Malaysia. Seven nights at Holiday Villa Langkawi including flights costs from £715pp until 9 December with Dial A Flight (020 7962 1000; www.dialaflight.com).
